appDescription: Vote for your favorite ghouls, goblins, and monsters to enter the esteemed ranks Dr. Frankenstein's Ghouls and Goblins Hall of Fame!
appTitle: Ghouls and Goblins Hall of Fame Fan Vote
homeDescription: Vote for your favorite ghouls and goblins to be inducted into our Hall of Fame! You can select up to {nominees} per user.
loginTitle: Enter your email address to vote
